snippet: In a sign that the outrage about domestic violence in the National Football League has expanded, a federal judge in Alabama faced abrupt and potent pressure to resign after he was charged with striking his wife last month at a luxury hotel in...
abstract: District Court Judge Mark E Fuller of Alabama faces abrupt and potent pressure to resign after he was charged with striking his wife at a luxury hotel in Atlanta; it is sign that outrage about domestic violence in National Football League has expanded.

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and CAMPBELL ROBERTSON
byline.contributor: Alan Blinder reported from Atlanta, and Campbell Robertson from New Orleans.

lead_paragraph: In a sign that the outrage about domestic violence in the National Football League has expanded, a federal judge in Alabama faced abrupt and potent pressure to resign after he was charged with striking his wife last month at a luxury hotel in Atlanta.

headline.main: Judge Accused of Assaulting Wife Is Urged to Resign
headline.print_headline: Judge Pressed to Resign After Abuse Charges
